title: Tom Brokaw: "Boom! Voices of the Sixties"
description: Michael's conversation with newsman Tom Brokaw on his book "Boom!: Voices of the Sixties - Personal Reflections on the '60s and Today." Original air date 27 November 2007. The book was published on 6 November 2007.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Tom Brokaw, Michael Smerconish)
